page.shortlink: api objects security object remove user from roles method
page.description: Removes a user from one or more roles.
page.syntax: Context.Security.RemoveUserFromRoles as L (UserName as C, RoleNames as C)

argument.name: L
argument.description: Return type, .T. if the user was removed from the roles; otherwise .F.

argument.name: UserName as C
argument.description: The name of the user to be removed from the role.

argument.name: RoleNames as C
argument.description: A list of role names from which the user should be removed. Role names are separated by a crlf.

page.discussion: Context.Security.RemoveUserFromRoles() removes a user from one or more roles. Check *[link:Context.Security.CallResult.Success@./index.xml#section1_CallResult]* before using the return value.
